extend_handle.description: Extend the handle for easy movement.

retract_handle.description: Retract the handle for compact storage.

clean_handle.description: Clean the handle to maintain hygiene.

slide_in_handle.description: Slide in the handle for storage.

press_handle.description: The state of the handle is now ready for use by pressing it.

retract_handle_for_storage.description: Retract the handle for saving space during storage.

cleaning_handle.description: Wipe the handle to ensure cleanliness.

spin_wheel.description: Spin the wheel to ensure its smooth operation.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel to remove any dirt or clutter.

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel to check its functionality.

rotate_to_check_functioning.description: Rotate the wheel to verify its smoothness.

cleaning_wheel.description: Wipe the wheel to clean any debris.

test_suitcase_body.description: Press the suitcase body to check its robustness.

clean_suitcase_body.description: Wipe the suitcase body to keep it clean and shiny.

press_suitcase_body.description: Press the suitcase body to check its durability.

wipe_suitcase_body.description: Clean the suitcase body to ensure a good appearance.

confirm_suitcase_clean.description: The suitcase body is now clean.

press_body_for_rigidity_check.description: Press the suitcase body to evaluate its rigidity.

cleaning_suitcase_body.description: Wipe the suitcase to remove any dirt.

examine_suitcase.description: Examine whole suitcase: extend the handle, spin the wheels, and press the suitcase body.

prepare_suitcase.description: Prepare suitcase for use - retract the handle, spin the wheels, and press the suitcase body.

sanitize_suitcase.description: Sanitize suitcase - clean the handle, wheels, and body.

use_suitcase.description: Use suitcase - clean the handle, spin wheels, press suitcase body.

ready_suitcase.description: The suitcase - handle, wheels, and body are clean and ready for use.

clean_suitcase.description: Clean the entire suitcase: handle, wheels, and body.

interact_suitcase.description: Interact with the suitcase: cleaning the handle, rotating the wheels, pressing the suitcase body.

confirm_suitcase_ready.description: The entire suitcase: handle, wheels, and body are clean and ready for use.

prepare_for_travel.description: Extend handle, check wheels and press body to confirm the suitcase is ready for travel.

prepare_for_storage.description: Retract handle, check wheels and press body to ready the suitcase for storage.

routine_cleanup.description: Clean handle, wheels and suitcase body for a generalized clean-up.

confirm_suitcase_status.description: The handle, wheels and body of the suitcase are now clean and checked for functionality.
